channel.title: Copy of Digg top 24 hours
channel.description: RSS feed with direct links to popular technology articles. based on superdigg pipe

item.title: [+2625] Best LOST Finale Party Invitation Ever [PIC]
item.description: If you're into that sort of thing...

item.title: [+2307] Remembering The Legacy Of President Bush [image]
item.description: It took a year to calculate the impact on the United States of 8 years of George W. Bush in the White House. Here's a look at the country he inherited and the country he left behind.

item.title: [+2252] Quantum teleportation achieved over ten miles of free space
item.description: Scientists have recently had success teleporting information between photons over a free space distance of nearly ten miles, an unprecedented length.

item.title: [+1344] WoW misunderstanding [Comic]
item.description: I know this can happen to me, on another game though...

item.title: [+1103] What the M’s stand for in “M&Ms”
item.description: In 1941, Forrest Mars Sr., of the Mars candy company, struck a deal with Bruce Murrie, son of famed Hershey president William Murrie, to develop a hard shelled candy with chocolate at the center. Mars needed Hershey’s chocolate because he anticipated there would be a chocolate shortage in the pending war, which turned out to be correct.

item.title: [+1067] Teacher suspended for President Obama assassination lesson
item.description: Richard Adams: An Alabama teacher has been suspended after a geometry lesson on the best angles to assassinate President Obama

item.title: [+966] But On The Plus Side.... (PIC)
[+893] Frozen Waves [PICS]
item.description: There are certain parts of the world that are covered by snow and ice even during the summer months. In fact, it is so cold that even waves seem to freeze in midair.

item.title: [+874] Rachel Maddow holds Rand Paul's Tea Party feet to the fire
item.description: Will the real Rand Paul please step forward? Tonight on MSNBC's Rachel Maddow show, host Rachel Maddow grilled the victorious Tea Party candidate Rand Paul, who last night in a landslide victory, won the GOP primary for the U.S. Senate seat in Kentucky. After such a good night last night, Dr. Paul was clearly sweating on the hot seat tonight.

item.title: [+780] A new low, even for CNN (PIC)
item.description: CNN asks the questions no one else in the world had the lack of taste to ask.

item.title: [+763] Ninjas rescue student from muggers
item.description: A STUDENT has been saved from a vicious assault - not by the boys in blue but by Ninjas

item.title: [+701] 7 Idiotic Things Rush Limbaugh Is Saying About the Oil Spill
item.description: In the days and weeks following the explosion on the Deepwater Horizon drilling rig and resulting oil spill in the Gulf of Mexico, Rush Limbaugh confirmed that his grasp of offshore energy policy and technology is a bit lacking.

item.title: [+693] 'North Korean torpedo' sank South's navy ship - r
item.description: A North Korean torpedo sank a South Korean navy ship in March with the loss of 46 sailors, an international report finds.

item.title: [+676] Crackdown in Bangkok [Pics]
[+628] Los Angeles PWNS Arizona on Energy Threats
item.description: "I might add that, as the City’s Job Czar, I certainly would welcome any conventions or meetings that were going to be held in Arizona to come to Los Angeles. We have fantastic facilities and incomparable weather and we’d welcome them to the City of Angels."Austin Beutner, General Manager, Los Angeles Department of Water and Power

item.title: [+624] I got a bad feeling about this flight (pic)
[+621] Craig Venter creates first synthetic life form
item.description: Craig Venter and his team have built the genome of a bacterium from scratch and put it into a cell to create a fully synthetic life form.

item.title: [+621] LOST: The 14 Casting Tapes That Started It All
item.description: Before the finale of LOST, see how far your favorite castaways have come. Check out our collection of Lost casting tapes -- including Matthew Fox and Jorge Garcia auditioning for the role of Sawyer.

item.title: [+571] PRIORITIES: HOUSE PASSES 'BEER' RESOLUTION
item.description: While most of Washington was focused on Tuesday's election results, the House was busy doing something else: Passing a resolution about beer.House Resolution 1297, sponsored by Rep. Betsy Markey, supports "the goals and ideals of American Craft Beer Week." "We've got quite a number of microbreweries and entrepreneurs that are creating jobs, and w
